summary: The Ecosystem Architecture series explores the evolution of ecosystems from biological contexts to organizational structures. It emphasizes decentralized, resilient systems that draw inspiration from nature. The series advocates for innovative approaches to global challenges, focusing on regenerative design and interconnected ecosystems. It proposes a shift from harmful practices to sustainable, collaborative methods that rejuvenate both planet and society across space and time.
excerpt: Ecosystem Architecture explores the transformation of ecosystem concepts from biology to organizational design. It advocates for decentralized, resilient systems inspired by nature to address global challenges through regenerative innovation.
